pageContext.description: Most of the blade is missing. The remaining edges of the [...] of blade are rough and torn. Locket becomes solid 56mm from its mouth. Well marked mid'rib.
pageContext.thickness: at mouth of [...] 16,across midrib at top 6
pageContext.patina: Very dark [...]; traces of golden bronze colour along ridge of midrib.
pageContext.surface: Smooth, except along edges of [...] of blade.
pageContext.associations: 1 Spearhead IV; 1 Spearhead Fragment. Found apparently with 2 bronze bridle-bits; 3 bronze pins; 3 bronze-a-sion [...] [...], all of 1a time period. Socketed Axes, torcs, & coins are also reported.
pageContext.remarks: Seems to be from same mould as the other Spearhead IV from the site. (1861.9.20.6.)
